item.title: new provider
item.description: I decided to change my blog's hosting provider and this is the first post using the new service. Please if you see any abnormal behaviour around here don't hesitate to contact me either at leonardoborges@leonardoborges.com or leonardoborges.rj@gmail.com Thanks!
